General.Name: Christina Lake Cannabis Corp
General.Description: Christina Lake Cannabis Corp. engages in the cultivation, processing, production, and sale of cannabis in British Columbia, Canada. It offers cannabis oil, hemp oil, and other hemp and cannabis derived products, as well as distillate oils. The company was formerly known as Cervantes Capital Corp. and changed its name to Christina Lake Cannabis Corp. in December 2018. Christina Lake Cannabis Corp. was incorporated in 2014 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2

4.Name: Mr. Salvatore  Milia
4.Title: Head of R&D and Independent Director
